noteLab.util
Class DebugConstants

java.lang.Object
  noteLab.util.DebugConstants

public class DebugConstants
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines constants that are set at compile time to modify the debugging information displayed by the application.

Author:
Dominic Kramer

Field Summary
static boolean DISABLE_PAPER
          If true, a Page's paper will not be displayed.
static boolean DISPLAY_BOUNDING_BOX
          If true, the bounding boxes around MBounded objects are rendered as they are rendered.
static boolean DISPLAY_UPDATE_BOX
          If true, the areas of the screen that are currently being painted have a box drawn around them to allow this areas to be visible.
 
Constructor Summary
private DebugConstants()
          Private to enforce the static use of this class's members.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

DISPLAY_BOUNDING_BOX

public static final boolean DISPLAY_BOUNDING_BOX
If true, the bounding boxes around MBounded objects are rendered as they are rendered.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DISPLAY_UPDATE_BOX

public static final boolean DISPLAY_UPDATE_BOX
If true, the areas of the screen that are currently being painted have a box drawn around them to allow this areas to be visible.
